TextView.android:text: Please read the following terms and conditions carefully as it sets out the terms of a legally binding agreement between you (The Salon Owner/Manager) and DMDT Technologies (For SalonQs).

1. Salon Owner/Manager (“Partner”) as using our SalonQs App for their business purpose DMDT Technologies who is owner of SalonQs App is charging per transaction 10% for the online services, online transaction and customer support. 

2. Those Salon Owner/Manager (“Partner”) are joining us in any of our promotional campaign they will be getting that offer during that period only and after that period gets over, they will have to start paying us flat 10% per transaction as per point number 1. 

3. Salon Owner/Manager (“Partner”) are agree with the services they provide to our customer; they are the sole responsible and DMDT Technologies (SalonQs) not responsible for any customer complaints and service-related issues. 

4. Salon Owner/Manager (“Partner”) are agreeing that they will accept the booking whenever they receive through SalonQs app and if Salon Owner/Manager (“Partner”) decline the customer then DMDT Technologies (SalonQs) is having rights to deduct 3% of the booking amount by customer since DMDT Technologies need to pay transactional charges to the Payment Gateway Company. 

5. Salon Owner/Manager (“Partner”) whatever price for each service will add in the application it will reflect to the customer directly in User application. DMDT Technologies (SalonQs) don’t change any amount per services. 

6. Salon Owner/Manager (“Partner”) whatever discount amount (%) enters in the app, it will directly reflect to the User app. DMDT Technologies don’t add any discount through Business app or charges any extra amount to show discounted price in User app. 

7. Salon Owner/Manager (“Partner”) need to provide valid documents to the DMDT Technologies (SalonQs) if legal issues came across then Salon Owner/Manager (“Partner”) will be sole responsible and need to justify legal sources. DMDT Technologies (SalonQs) is not responsible for any misconduct/services-related issue happened. 

8. Salon Owner/Manager (“Partner”) have to add “Chair Availability” based on total number of Queues they are managing through our Business App. Number of Barbers are nothing but number of Queues and nothing but number of chairs available in the salon. (Number of Barber = Number of Chairs = Number of Queues). Please contact our help button to contact us for more information.
